content.raw:
I found that this solution was insufficient.

**Steps**

Added directory and symlink to match above:

```
➜  wamv_description tree
.
├── CHANGELOG.rst
├── CMakeLists.txt
├── mesh
│   ├── engine.dae
│   ├── propeller.dae
│   ├── WAM-V-Base.dae
│   └── WamV.png
├── package.xml
├── urdf
│   ├── battery.xacro
│   ├── cpu_cases.xacro
│   ├── thrusters
│   │   └── engine.xacro
│   └── wamv_base.urdf.xacro
└── wamv_description
    ├── mesh -> ../mesh
    └── model.config
```

_Terminal 1_

`source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh`

`export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models:/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description` \(replace tylerlum with <username>\)

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true`

Manually delete wamv model \(click on boat, right click, delete\)

ERROR:

```
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/mesh"
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/urdf"
```

It appears that for each path in `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`, it checks ALL its subdirectories for a `model.config` file.

_Terminal 2_

`source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_wamv.launch wamv_target:=$HOME/my_urdf.urdf`

`gz model --model-name=wamv --spawn-file=$HOME/my_urdf.urdf`

Long wait….

```
[Wrn] [msgs.cc:1852] Conversion of sensor type[gpu_ray] not supported.
[Msg] usv_gazebo_dynamics_plugin: waveParams is null.  Trying to get wave parameters from ocean model
[Wrn] [ModelDatabase.cc:340] Getting models from[http://models.gazebosim.org/]. This may take a few seconds.
[Wrn] [msgs.cc:1852] Conversion of sensor type[gpu_ray] not supported.
[Wrn] [FuelModelDatabase.cc:248] URI not supported by Fuel [model://vrx_gazebo/models/cpu_cases/mesh/cpu_cases.dae]
[Wrn] [SystemPaths.cc:459] File or path does not exist [""] [model://vrx_gazebo/models/cpu_cases/mesh/cpu_cases.dae]
[Err] [Visual.cc:3005] No mesh specified
[Wrn] [FuelModelDatabase.cc:248] URI not supported by Fuel [model://vrx_gazebo/models/cpu_cases/mesh/cpu_cases.dae]
```

_Figure 1: Base shows, but missing sensors_
content.html:
I found that this solution was insufficient.

Steps

Added directory and symlink to match above:

➜  wamv_description tree
.
├── CHANGELOG.rst
├── CMakeLists.txt
├── mesh
│   ├── engine.dae
│   ├── propeller.dae
│   ├── WAM-V-Base.dae
│   └── WamV.png
├── package.xml
├── urdf
│   ├── battery.xacro
│   ├── cpu_cases.xacro
│   ├── thrusters
│   │   └── engine.xacro
│   └── wamv_base.urdf.xacro
└── wamv_description
    ├── mesh -> ../mesh
    └── model.config

Terminal 1

source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh

export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models:/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description (replace tylerlum with <username>)

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true

Manually delete wamv model (click on boat, right click, delete)

ERROR:

[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/mesh"
[Err] [InsertModelWidget.cc:433] Missing model.config for model "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/wamv_description/urdf"

It appears that for each path in GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH, it checks ALL its subdirectories for a model.config file.

Terminal 2

source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_wamv.launch wamv_target:=$HOME/my_urdf.urdf

gz model --model-name=wamv --spawn-file=$HOME/my_urdf.urdf

Long wait….

[Msg] usv_gazebo_dynamics_plugin: waveParams is null.  Trying to get wave parameters from ocean model
